import React, { Component } from 'react' import SimpleEvent from './SimpleEvent.js' import './Events.css' import { useState,useEffect } from "react"; const API_BASE="http://localhost:3001"; export default class AddEvent extends Component { render() { return (
setPopupActive(false)}>x

setNewTitle(e.target.value)} value={newTitle} placeholder="Title" required /> setNewDescription(e.target.value)} value={newDescription} placeholder="Adress" required/> setNewAdresss(e.target.value)} value={newAdress} placeholder="Event Adress" required/> setNewDate(e.target.value)} value={newDate} placeholder="Event Date" required/>
) } }
